strapiPost.title: SoNA Tickets On Sale For Biggest & Boldest Season
strapiPost.content:
Tickets for the “biggest and boldest” season yet of the Symphony of Northwest Arkansas (SoNA) are now on sale and promising time-honored and new compositions, ideas, and collaborators. 

  • Branching out: There is not a theme this time around but an overarching vision that will manifest through broad thinking of what orchestral music can be and the expansion of the definition of classical music. 
  • Performances: The first show will be on October 29 and is called Imagine Big. In addition to the usual, A Very SoNA Christmas and The Snowman: A Family Concert, the 2022-23 season will feature Mother and Child, New Canons, Battle of the Bands, and Evoking Folklore. 

Click HERE for more information and tickets to SoNA’s biggest season yet!
